nautobot_ssot_ipfabric.tests.fixtures

Fixtures.

In your test file, simply import: ` from nautobot_ssot_ipfabric.utilities import json_fixture from nautobot_ssot_ipfabric.tests.fixtures import real_path ` Then you can simply load fixtures that you have added to the fixtures directory and assign them to your mocks by using the json_fixture utility:

json_fixture(f”{FIXTURES}/get_projects.json”)

This will return a loaded json object.
